name: The Father's Tale And A Shovel
name_original: The Father's Tale And A Shovel
description:
Dig into the underground, search for historical items, share information to the people and escape the agents.

The Father's Tale And A Shovel

Made by slost and AGZA13th

Story

Your father used to tell you a tale about the tower of god.  Someday you go to the tower, then found a shovel and a sign that says “Don’t Dig!”.

How to play
  • Use W-A-S-D to control
  • Swing your mouse to dig and escape to exit
  • Find a history item, then share to the people
  • Care agent, They want to destroy that item
Caution

This is game was develop during Global Gam Jam 2021,  so it may have a lot of bugs.
